name: Christmas Girls
description:
It's Christmas time! Everyone is looking forward to it, including our girls! They have already put on their Christmas hats, so they are ready! Find all the gifts and don't get trapped.



In the game, your goal is to collect gifts and not get trapped. Solve the puzzles in the correct order and collect all the gifts!🎁

Special Features

  • 🎄 Well-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • ❄️ Live2D dynamic character
  • 🥂 Christmas mood
  • ⛄ CG Gallery Mode
  • 🎅 Relaxing music
  • 🎁 Puzzle game
